Package bto.Controllers

package bto.Controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApplicationController
    The ApplicationController class manages BTO (Build-To-Order) housing project applications.
    AuthController
    The AuthController class manages user authentication and user account management for the BTO housing system.
    BookingController
    The BookingController class manages the flat booking process for BTO (Build-To-Order) housing projects.
    EnquiryController
    The EnquiryController class manages enquiries in the BTO housing system.
    FileManager
    Manages file operations for the BTO system including loading and saving data.
    ProjectController
    The ProjectController class manages BTO (Build-To-Order) housing projects in the system.
    ReceiptGenerator
    The ReceiptGenerator class creates formatted receipts for BTO flat bookings.
    RegistrationController
    The RegistrationController class manages officer registrations for BTO housing projects.
    ReportController
    The ReportController class manages the generation and formatting of reports for the BTO housing system.
    WithdrawalController
    Controller class responsible for managing withdrawal requests from applicants.
